title: Profile needs to be update
body: My profile says I'm LVL 5 but I'm actually Silver 3, how do I go about getting it updated? I can never post or reply

replies.body:
Are you referencing your Boards profile or your client profile?  From looking at your Boards Profile, it seems that you have been properly updated to level 30 when I hover over.

If you are still seeing some weird issues with this, don't hesitate to reply back and let me know!
